6502.quoteText: DiscourseHosting.com has the discretion to update this privacy policy at any time. When we do, we will revise the updated date at the bottom of this page. We encourage Users to frequently check this page for any changes to stay informed about how we are helping to protect the personal information we collect. You acknowledge and agree that it is your responsibility to review this privacy policy periodically and become aware of modifications.
6502.title: The privacy policy may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
tosdr.tldr: Their privacy policy state: "DiscourseHosting.com has the discretion to update this privacy policy at any time. When we do, we will revise the updated date at the bottom of this page. We encourage Users to frequently check this page for any changes to stay informed about how we are helping to protect the personal information we collect. You acknowledge and agree that it is your responsibility to review this privacy policy periodically and become aware of modifications."

6503.quoteText:
Changes to the TOS

DiscourseHosting reserves the right to amend any or all of the above policies, guidelines and disclaimer upon thirty (30) days prior written notice to you.
6503.title: When the service wants to change its Terms of Service, users are notified a month or more in advance

tosdr.case: When the service wants to change its terms, users are notified a month or more in advance
tosdr.tldr: As stated in the Terms of Service, DiscourseHosting reserves the right to amend any or all of the above policies, guidelines and disclaimer upon thirty (30) days prior written notice to you.

6504.quoteText: Customer agrees that it shall defend, indemnify, save and hold DiscourseHosting harmless from any and all demands, liabilities, losses, costs and claims, including reasonable attorney’s fees asserted against DiscourseHosting, its agents, its customers, officers and employees, that may arise or result from any service provided or performed or agreed to be performed or any product sold by customer, its agents, employees or assigns.
6504.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

tosdr.case: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

6505.quoteText:
We offer an uptime guarantee of 99.9%.
Any downtime over 0.1% will be refunded with a prorated fee based on actual downtime per month.
Our network and servers are monitored continuously, and are rarely down except for scheduled maintenance and hardware and software upgrades.
6505.title: Accessibility to this service is guaranteed at 99.9%

tosdr.case: Accessibility to this service is guaranteed at 99% or more
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Service state: "We offer an uptime guarantee of 99.9%. Any downtime over 0.1% will be refunded with a prorated fee based on actual downtime per month. Our network and servers are monitored continuously, and are rarely down except for scheduled maintenance and hardware and software upgrades."

6507.quoteText: DiscourseHosting shall not be responsible for any claimed damages, including incidental and consequential damages, which may arise from DiscourseHosting’ servers going off-line or being unavailable for any reason whatsoever.

6508.quoteText: Certain services provided by DiscourseHosting are resold. Thus, certain equipment, routing, software and programming used by DiscourseHosting are not directly owned or written by DiscourseHosting.

6510.quoteText:
User may choose to set their web browser to refuse cookies, or to alert you when cookies are being sent.
If they do so, note that some parts of the Site may not function properly.
